column4: hey.. anyone can help me? I have a memory card, but I'm unable to format it.. gparted nor mkfs.vfat doesnt work :(
plug it in then dmesg|tail then sudo mkfs.vfat /dev/sdb1  <-- or whatever partition dmesg shows
be VERY sure of the partition you dont want to format a HD partition
http://openpaste.org/en/4787/ I get some strange errors
